description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Contact' that renders a contact form section with input fields for name, email, and message, and a submit handler that displays a thank you message.

methods.name: Contact()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a contact form with state management for submission status.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handler function invoked when the form is submitted; prevents default behavior and sets a thank you message.
